titles.title: Congratulating the on-premise sign industry for its contributions to the success of small businesses.
Congratulating the on-premise sign industry for its contributions to the success of small businesses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.
Ms. Clarke moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 298.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Applauds the Small Business Administration for educating small business owners on the benefits of using on-premises signs to overcome competitive disadvantages in marketing and advertising.
Encourages the on-premise sign industry to continue its efforts to develop safer, more effective, and more affordable signage products to alleviate such disadvantages.
